About me

Hi there 👋 My name is Rui Tao(陶瑞). I'm currently a junior undergraduate student in SJTU, majoring in computer science in IEEE class. My research interests include machine learning, combinatorial optimization and multimoding. I'm honored to be an intern-researcher in ReThinkLab, advised by Prof. Junchi Yan and Dr. Liangliang Shi, focusing on variant Optimal Transportation(OT) and its applications.
